summary: This increases the volume of footsteps from the player's perspective. Sneaking sounds are also altered slightly. This mod does not affect the NPCs footsteps.
descriptionHtml:
SKYRIM - Footsteps Volume Fixer

This increases the volume of footsteps from the player's perspective. Sneaking sounds are also altered slightly. This mod does not affect the NPCs footsteps.

I know, there is already a mod like this but I wasn't completely satisfied with it, since (as far as I could tell) it didn't affect all footsteps. My mod does. Even the volume of sneaking sounds are increased a bit, so now you can hear every single footsteps you make. :)

NOTE: If you don't want to alter your sneaking footstep sounds, simply delete the corresponding directories from my mod.

Have fun!
author: woszkar
